comments.author: Reincarnated.1754
comments.body:
Thank you.

Ah yes, Aetherium as well.
Theres another problem with Aetherium. there’s no item_id in guild/upgrades.
Would be nice to have an icon for it

Being able to see the amount of Favour and Aetherium would finish of my little app. nicely

comments.author: Lawton Campbell.8517
comments.body: Guild favor (and the other guild currencies) aren’t currently available via the API. There’s an endpoint that isn’t turned on (don’t remember why — probably needs more testing) that exposes it; I can look into enabling it sometime next week.

comments.author: Reincarnated.1754
comments.body:
I’m having another play with the API again and started a new project (in progress).
Guild Treasury Status if you would like to try it?

Any ways, Just wondered if there is an API that shows how much Guild Favor a guild has?

Have I missed it some where?
I don’t seem to be able to find it.

If I haven’t missed it, then can we have it added to one of the API’s?
Say Guild Treasury perhaps?
